title: Voice AI Dating App Known Raises $9.7M to Revolutionize How We Find Love
description: BitcoinWorldVoice AI Dating App Known Raises $9.7M to Revolutionize How We Find LoveIn a world where swipe fatigue and digital loneliness plague modern dating, a groundbreaking startup has emerged with a compelling solution. Known, a San Francisco-based dating app, is leveraging voice AI technology to transform how people connect, moving beyond superficial profiles to foster genuine, in-person relationships. With an impressive $9.7 million in recent funding, this [...]This post Voice AI Dating App Known Raises $9.7M to Revolutionize How We Find Love first appeared on BitcoinWorld.

title: Off-duty AI Express pilot assaults passenger at Delhi airport; suspended
description: An Air India Express pilot faces suspension after an alleged physical assault on a passenger at Delhi airport. The incident occurred near the security area. The passenger reported the altercation on social media, sharing images of his injuries. The airline has launched an investigation into the employee's conduct. The pilot was traveling as a passenger on another airline.

title: VGT: An Efficient ETF To Capture The Growth Of AI
description: Vanguard Information Technology ETF (VGT) offers focused exposure to the AI-driven tech sector, outperforming SPY and QQQ YTD with an 18% total return. Read the full analysis here.

title: OpenAI’s Crucial Move: New ChatGPT Teen Safety Rules Emerge as AI Regulation Looms
description: BitcoinWorldOpenAI’s Crucial Move: New ChatGPT Teen Safety Rules Emerge as AI Regulation LoomsIn a pivotal moment for artificial intelligence governance, OpenAI has unveiled comprehensive new safety rules specifically designed to protect teenage users of ChatGPT. title: GAO dismisses protests challenging GSA's $1 Gen AI pacts
description: The Government Accountability Office never looked at the merits of Sage's complaints about the agreements with OpenAI and Anthropic instead dismissing them over jurisdiction and standing issues.
